code: @Test public void testMailNoRecipients() throws Exception {     try {         template.sendBody("direct:a", "Hello World").         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (CamelExecutionException e) {         IllegalArgumentException iae = assertIsInstanceOf(IllegalArgumentException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("The mail message does not have any recipients set.", iae.getMessage()).     } }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:a").to("smtp://localhost"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:a").to("smtp://localhost").         }     }. }
